msg.author: Daenerys Targaryen
msg.title: Game of Thrones
msg.content: Hi, Jon! I'm waiting for you in the west.

msg.author: Frank Underwood
msg.title: President
msg.content: Finally, I'm the president of the United States of America.

msg.author: Daenerys Targaryen
msg.title: Queen
msg.content: I know that I will be the next queen by my own way.

msg.author: Javier Peña
msg.title: We have arrested Pablo Escobar
msg.content: Pablo Escobar was in an old house that he had in Medellín.

msg.author: Sheldon Cooper
msg.title: The String Theory is fascinating
msg.content: I have made new advances in this theory.
